section.title: Installing Keyman Desktop
section.para: You will be guided through the installation process by the setup wizard. At any time during the installation you can click Back to return to the previous step.

When you start the installer, you may be prompted to allow the installer to access your system. Click Continue to start the installer. The first screen to be displayed will be the installer Welcome Screen. Click Install Keyman Desktop to start the installation process.

note.para: The Keyman Desktop installer will, by default, check on the Tavultesoft website for an updated version before starting to install. If it finds an updated version, it will allow you to download and install the updated version so that you can access new features and bug fixes. If you do not wish to check for an updated version, deselect the Check for updates online before installing check box.

section.para: The next screen to be displayed is the Welcome screen.

listitem.para: Click on the Next button. The End-User Licence Agreement screen is displayed. You must accept the terms of the licence agreement before installation can continue. Selecting this checkbox will indicate that you accept the terms of the licence agreement and allow you to continue installation.
Check "I accept the terms in the Licence Agreement".
Click on Next. The Choose Setup Type screen is displayed:

entry.para: Recommended for most users. Installs the Keyman Desktop Application Files, the Character Map, the Text Services Framework Addin and the RichEdit Addin.
Recommended for advanced users. Allows users to choose which program features to install and where to install them.

listitem.para: Keyman Desktop Professional 7.0 is installed on your machine.
